tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biometric_payment_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date DATE,
    biometric_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE biometric_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    biometric_data TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
  transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transaction_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_alerts (
  alert_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  alert_message TEXT NOT NULL,
  alert_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE report_data (
  report_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  report_content TEXT NOT NULL,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL
);
Generate reports on biometric payment transactions and fraud detection using SQL queries.
Table for biometric data of users.
